ISSUE.TITLE: Make exception_msg_ more than 255 characters in Job interface
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, The column exception_msg_ in table act_ru_deadletter_job gets truncated at 255 characters but the max length of this column is 4000. And it is apparently confirmed by this code in the interface JobInfo I suppose : ``` public interface Job extends JobInfo { int MAX_EXCEPTION_MESSAGE_LENGTH = 255; ``` Is it possible to have this configurable in ProcessEngineConfigurationImpl for example or somewhere else ? This feature is related to this post I have done on the [forum](https://forum.flowable.org/t/column-exception-msg-in-table-act-ru-deadletter-job-gets-truncated-to-255/9511) Regards All, And thanks for your feedback

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Increase exception message length from 255 characters to 2000 (#3382) Fixes #3372
